issue.title: [CF 1064] Meta icon priority
issue.body:
Hello! Thank you for one of the best addons ever made for wow. I have been using TMW for a bit of time now and i find it more and more useful for all kinds of situations. One thing i am missing tho, is an enhanced way of meta icon prioritizing, like for example: (in order of priority)

Default:
Icon 1
Icon 2
Icon 3

On condition:
Icon 3
Icon 1
Icon 2

Maybe this is achievable with longer strains of meta icons, but my problemsolving only goes that far, sorry if this is the case. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user shisagi | Imported from CurseForge issue #1064 | Raw

comments.body:
Make 2 meta icon, each with the desired variation on order, and add conditions to those meta icons. You can then combine those 2 meta icons into a single meta icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thank you for a quick and helpful response! :)


> Posted by CurseForge user shisagi
